name: situation-based-language-learning
description: Monorepo for the Situation-Based Language Learning project

scripts.backend:dev: npm run shared:build && npm run dev --workspace @sbl/backend
scripts.backend:build: npm run shared:build && npm run build --workspace @sbl/backend
scripts.backend:start: npm run shared:build && npm run start --workspace @sbl/backend
scripts.cms:dev: npm run shared:build && npm run dev --workspace @sbl/frontend-cms
scripts.cms:build: npm run shared:build && npm run build --workspace @sbl/frontend-cms
scripts.cms:preview: npm run shared:build && npm run preview --workspace @sbl/frontend-cms
scripts.cram:dev: npm run shared:build && npm run dev --workspace @sbl/frontend-cram
scripts.cram:build: npm run shared:build && npm run build --workspace @sbl/frontend-cram
scripts.cram:preview: npm run shared:build && npm run preview --workspace @sbl/frontend-cram
